price: Yere gireni, ondan çıkanı, gökten ineni, oraya yükseleni bilir. O, çok merhametlidir, çok bağışlayıcıdır.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā yaliju fī al-arḍi wamā yakhruju min'hā wamā yanzilu mina al-samāi wamā yaʿruju fīhā wahuwa al-raḥīmu al-ghafūru
